name: Reel Echo
details: Tape EchoBuilt with options for tube/solid state styles, a warble switch for organic tape pitch deviation and speed range control of up to 1500ms, the Danelectro DTE-1 Reel Echo Tape Simulator Pedal brings warm, atmospheric, analog tape delay in a reliable, manageable package. Capable of summoning haunting trails and delay along with a unique Sound on Sound stomp switch for layering multiple tracks, this is an excellent addition to an ambient, post-rock, or shoegaze arsenal.
